attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and cut their unneccessary expenses back drastically before he cuts public spending.That way he would save a lot more money,instead of always cutting public spending. Its seem its always the Public who are penalised. Lets face it Ministers get a decent wage anyway, plus perks.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
